title: ESIC Gujarat Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in for 14 Specialist, Senior Resident Posts
description: The Employees' State Insurance Corporation Gujarat (ESIC Gujarat) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 14 Senior Resident, Specialist Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their post-graduation and diploma can apply for the ESIC Gujarat Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview.
